script.source: if (doc.containsKey('answer.as.number') && doc['answer.as.number'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('answer.as.organization.name.keyword') && doc['answer.as.organization.name.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['answer.as.number'].value + ': ' + doc['answer.as.organization.name.keyword']; emit(m); }
